name: Wipeout Create & Crash
description: Create your own wipeouts with the new course creator! Create your own levels, and share them with your friends and family! Crash the courses as either fan-favorite or all-new character including 80â€™s Pop Star and Zombie guy! Compete in over-the-top new courses like Prehistoric Times and Precarious Pirate Caper with all new themed obstacles! Challenge your friends to reign supreme in, side-by-side or team multiplayer!
